title: Best cycling deals 2023: Hand-picked deals for bike lovers
content:
Cyclist
Best cycling deals 2023: Hand-picked deals for bike lovers

Looking for great deals on everything you need for cycling? We’ve collected our favourite deals here, with some hefty discounts on cycling jackets, gloves and warmers, just in time for winter, as well as indoor cycling equipment and even a deal on inner tubes.

Like David Dickinson in a Herefordshire auction room, we go mad for a bargain here at Cyclist. From winter jackets to turbo trainers, we’ve hand-picked some of the best deals on cycling clohing and cycling goods available right now. If nothing takes your fancy now, keep checking back as we keep this page regularly updated.

Best cycling deals UK

  1. Castelli Go Jacket: RRP £230 – Buy now from Tredz for £79.99
  2. Gorewear Spirit Cycling Jacket: RRP 149.99 – Buy now from Chain Reaction Cycles for £73.44
  3. Endura Pro SL HC Windproof Cycling Jacket II: RRP £139.99 – Buy now from Tredz for £49.99
  4. Castelli Fondo 2 Long Sleeve Jersey: RRP £110 – Buy now from Tredz for £55
  5. Bora-Hansgrohe Replica Gilet: RRP £90 – Buy now from Le Col for £36
  6. Dhb Moda Women’s High Cut Bib Shorts: RRP £65 – Buy now from Wiggle for £16.25
  7. Endura BaaBaa Blend Long Sleeve Base Layer: RRP £54.99 – Buy now from Wiggle for £24.20
  8. Dhb Short Sleeve Seamless Base Layer: RRP £30 – Buy now from Wiggle for £15.00
  9. Shimano RC702 SPD-SL Road Cycling Shoes: RRP £189.99 – Buy now from Tredz for £94.99
  10. POC Omne Air Resistance MIPS Helmet: RRP £150 – Buy now from Chain Reaction Cycles for £50.00
  11. Lifeline Xplova NOZA S Smart Trainer: RRP £699.99 – Buy now from Wiggle for £349.99
  12. Lifeline Home Mechanic Wheel Truing Stand: RRP £79.99 – Buy now from Wiggle for £34.99
  13. Castelli Unlimited Long Finger Cycling Gloves: RRP £46 – Buy now from Wiggle for £13.76
  14. Endura FS260-Pro Nemo 2 Waterproof Gloves Hi-viz: RRP £32.99 – Buy now from Cyclestore for £16.50
  15. Altura Firestorm Cycling Overshoes: RRP £39.99 – Buy now from Tredz for £9.99
  16. Funkier Repel SLV-658 Thermal Arm Warmers: RRP £29.99 – Buy now from Tredz for £9.99
  17. Endura Thermolite Full Zip Legwarmers: RRP £32.99 – Buy now from Cyclestore for £18.14
  18. Raleigh Strada Men’s Hybrid Bike: RRP £449 – Buy now from Halfords for £340
  19. Dhb Micro Saddle Bag: RRP £12 – Buy now from Wiggle for £3
  20. Topeak Mini 9 Pro Multi Tool: RRP £22.99 – Buy now from Wiggle for £8.99
  21. Elite Custom Race Plus Bottle Cage: RRP £19.99 – Buy now from Merlin for £8.50
  22. Continental Quality Road Inner Tube: RRP £7.49 – Buy now from Wiggle for £2.99-£4.99

The best cycling deals as picked by the team at Cyclist

Castelli Go Jacket

£79.99 (RRP £230) | View offer

  • Lightweight winter protection
  • Good for cold, drier conditions

Made from three-layer Gore Infinium Windstopper 150 fabric, the Go jacket has the whole range of winter protection: it’s windproof, water resistant, lightweight and stretchy, ideal for comfortable riding in cold conditions. There’s enough stretch to add a winter base layer underneath.

The cut is similar to the Castelli Perfetto, but with a little less water resistance for comfort in drier rides. There’s the full array of pockets, including one on the breast, a reflective rear strip and close cuffs to help keep out the cold.

  • Buy now from Tredz for £79.99

Gorewear Spirit Cycling Jacket

£73.44 (RRP 149.99) | View offer

  • Relaxed cut for layering
  • Gore Infinium windproof fabric construction

Another windproof jacket option constructed from Gore Infinium fabric, the Spirit jacket has a more relaxed cut than the Castelli Go. The adjustable cuffs and waistband help keep out cold winds and there’s plenty of space to layer up underneath.

As with the Castelli jacket, there are reflectives, while a zipped chest pocket and single zipped rear pocket mean you shouldn’t lose anything while out on the road.

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction Cycles for £73.44

Endura Pro SL HC Windproof Cycling Jacket II

£49.99 (RRP £139.99) | View offer

  • Bold pattern with reflectives for enhanced road presence
  • Thermal insulation for comfort in cold, dry conditions

The Endura Pro SL HC Windproof Cycling Jacket II adds a little more insulation than the jackets above, for colder weather riding, but still has the same windproof/water resistant features. The back panel helps wick away moisture to ensure that you stay comfortable.

The bright pattern, which is continued onto the upper back, should help you to increase your road presence and is paired with in-built reflectives for low light riding.

  • Buy now from Tredz for £49.99

Castelli Fondo 2 Long Sleeve Jersey

£55 (RRP £110) | View offer

  • Quoted temperature range from 12 – 18 degrees C
  • Room to layer up for cooler rides

Castelli reckons that on its own the Fondo 2 jersey is good for temperatures from 12 to 18 degrees C. Add a shell over it and you can go a lot lower. It quotes a weight of 255g for a size medium, so it’s not too heavy either.

Castelli describes the cut as a neutral fit, so it shouldn’t be pro-level tight and should allow you to layer up underneath. There’s a reasonable range of size/colour options on offer at Tredz.

  • Buy now from Tredz for £55

Bora-Hansgrohe Replica Gilet

£36 (RRP £90) | View offer

  • Windproof and water resistant
  • Mesh panels to add comfort when working hard

Packable enough to take with you if the weather is iffy, Le Col’s team replica gilet adds an extra layer of protection for your core from wind and showers if the conditions take a turn for the worse.

To keep you comfortable, there are added mesh panels in the sides and back and the high collar is fleece lined. The Bora-Hansgrohe team colours don’t tend to change much between years, so you’ll probably not look too out of date come next racing season.

  • Buy now from Le Col for £36

Dhb Moda Women’s High Cut Bib Shorts

£16.25 (RRP £65) | View offer

  • Design allows you to dispense with a base layer
  • Support for a more upright position and rides up to three hours

Dhb offers impressive value even when it isn’t on offer, but at the reduced price these shorts are a steal. They’re designed so that they can be worn with a sports bra, dispensing with a base layer for summer riding thanks to the high front coverage.

The Elastic Interface seat pad is placed for less aggressive riding and Dhb claims that it’s good for up to three hours in the saddle. There’s a longer leg without the usual elastic grippers, so that you should avoid sausage leg.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £16.25

Endura BaaBaa Blend Long Sleeve Base Layer

£24.20 (RRP £54.99) | View offer

  • Merino wool content for warmth and odour resistance
  • Cycling specific cut

With 20 percent merino wool content, the Endura BaaBaa base layer is comfortable, odour resistant and ideal once the weather turns cold. It’s fast drying and wicks sweat effectively to help keep you dry on harder rides.

The high collar and cycling specific cut mean no cold spots and the flatlocked seams avoid rubbing. It’s a great base layer as a foundation for winter layering.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £24.20

Dhb Short Sleeve Seamless Base Layer

£15.00 (RRP £30) | View offer

  • High wicking nylon with elastane for stretch
  • Knitted zones to help keep you drier

This nylon base layer from Dhb is mid-weight, so it’s good for rides when the temperature’s not too hot. It’s built without seams and includes knitted areas that increase stretch and ventilation on the chest and the mid-back, where things can often get sweaty.

With four percent elastane content, there’s a close fit for efficient wicking. It’s available in either black or white and in a range of four sizes.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £15.00

Shimano RC702 SPD-SL Road Cycling Shoe

£94.99 (RRP £189.99) | View offer

  • Stiff carbon sole with low stack height
  • Two Boa dials for precise fit adjustment

Using Shimano’s S-Phyre tech, the RC702 shoe has a stiffness rating of 10 on Shimano’s scale and a double Boa dial closure allows you to adjust the fit precisely during a ride. Shimano quotes a weight per shoe of 240g for a size 42, so the shoe is lightweight. It has a low stack height and the extensive forefoot perforations ensure good ventilation.

Finding your size marked down can be difficult for cycling shoes, but there’s a reasonable range of sizes available in both black and white, including some half sizes, although the red colour option has a more limited size range available.

  • Buy now from Tredz for £94.99

POC Omne Air Resistance MIPS Helmet

£50.00 (RRP £150) | View offer

  • Added protection from MIPS Integra liner
  • Detachable peak for on/off-road riding

The POC Omne is a versatile all-rounder helmet and includes a removable visor for all-terrain riding. It has POC’s 360 degree adjustment system, for a dialled-in, comfortable fit.

The Omne includes MIPS for extra crash protection. The blue colourway in size small is just £50, but other sizes and colours are also discounted on Wiggle’s site.

  • Buy now from Chain Reaction Cycles for £50.00

Lifeline Xplova NOZA S Smart Trainer

£349.99 (RRP £699.99) | View offer

  • 2500 watts resistance and 18% grade simulation
  • Compatible with Zwift and other training apps

This Lifeline trainer is half price currently, making it one of the cheapest wheel-off smart trainer options available. It’s BLE and ANT+ enabled, so it can be hooked up to a phone. tablet or computer to link to Zwift and other training apps.

With resistance up to 2,500W and the ability to simulate an 18 percent climb, there’s enough to satisfy the most powerful rider, while Lifeline claims quiet operation and +/-2.5 percent power measurement accuracy.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £349.99

Lifeline Home Mechanic Wheel Truing Stand

£34.99 (RRP £79.99) | View offer

  • Compact, easy to use design
  • Works for wheels up to 29 inches with axles up to 135mm wide

Building or truing your own wheels is a deeply satisfying task, which requires a truing stand for the most precise alignment of the rims. The Lifeline truing stand provides a cost-effective option that’s easy to stow away when not needed and includes a calliper to make it easy to assess the wheel’s lateral and radial alignment.

The design can only accept wheels with hubs up to 135mm wide, so you’re not going to be able to true road or gravel bike wheels with 142mm thru-axles.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £34.99

Castelli Unlimited Long Finger Cycling Gloves

£13.76 (RRP £46) | View offer

  • Lightweight gloves for protection when riding gravel
  • Include median nerve and fingertip protection

Castelli’s lightweight Unlimited gloves weigh 45g and are designed for protection for the gravel rider, although they’d work equally well on the road. They add a little extra warmth too and their Castelli Damping System helps to provide comfort and shield the median nerve when riding over uneven surfaces.

They include plenty of stretch and grippy synthetic palms, while the fingertips are durable and touchscreen sensitive.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £13.76

Endura FS260-Pro Nemo 2 Waterproof Gloves Hi-viz

£16.50 (RRP £32.99) | View offer

  • Warm and waterproof
  • Reflective with touchscreen fingertips

Neoprene is a good option for cold, wet weather riding, providing both insulation and waterproofing. The Endura FS260-Pro Nemo 2 Waterproof Gloves offer a touch of colour on a drear day too, as well as a good spread of reflectives.

The inside is fleeced for extra warmth and there’s a long cuff for plenty of overlap with a rain jacket, so they’ll help keep out the wet. There’s a touchscreen-sensitive fingertip, so you can operate your cycling computer effectively as you ride.

  • Buy now from Cyclestore for £16.50

Altura Firestorm Cycling Overshoes

£9.99 (RRP £39.99) | View offer

  • All-over reflective print
  • Only available from Tredz in XL

Overshoes are a great option for cold weather riding as well as in the wet, adding some extra insulation to one of the most exposed parts of your body when riding. The Altura Firestorm overshoes are made of an insulated, breathable softshell fabric, so they’re windproof and water resistant with a full-length rear zip to make them easy to get on and off.

They include Altura’s signature all-over reflectives, so they’re a great option for night riding. Tredz only has the XL size available though.

  • Buy now from Tredz for £9.99

Funkier Repel SLV-658 Thermal Arm Warmers

£9.99 (RRP £29.99) | View offer

  • Insulated lightweight arm warmers
  • Water repellent coating

The Funkier arm warmers offer an extra layer for cooler starts that is easy to remove or just roll down to your wrists once you warm up. The lightweight microfleece interior surface helps to trap warm air to help keep your arms that bit warmer.

There’s added protection from damp conditions thanks to the water repellent surface treatment and the Lycra content means that the arm warmers should stay up well and not drop down to expose your upper arms to draughts.

  • Buy now from Tredz for £9.99

Endura Thermolite Full Zip Legwarmers

£18.14 (RRP £32.99) | View offer

  • Full zip for easy on/off
  • Reflectives for added road presence

Endura includes a full zip in its leg warmers, so that they’re easy to put on and take off, either during your ride or as an extra layer to protect your legs before and after riding.

They’re held in place by top and bottom silicone grippers and coated to repel moisture. Endura says that the hollow fibre fabric adds a lot on insulation for its weight, wicks well and doesn’t get too heavy even if you are riding in the rain.

  • Buy now from Cyclestore for £18.14

Raleigh Strada Men’s Hybrid Bike

£340 (RRP £449) | View offer

  • 650b wheels and wide tyres for comfort
  • Full mudguards and 21-speed gears for all-weather versatility

The Raleigh Strada rides on 650b wheels with 47mm WTB Horizon tyres, making a commute over broken road surfaces a bit more comfortable. The upright ride position helps you to keep an eye around you as you ride too, while full mudguards equip the Strada for all-weather riding.

A triple chainset and wide-range 14-34 tooth cassette, along with seven speed gearing let you handle the uphills as well as the flat, however laden down you are on your commute. It’s a low priced, robust, practical option for city riders.

  • Buy now from Halfords for £340

Dhb Micro Saddle Bag

£3 (RRP £12) | View offer

  • Lightweight, compact design
  • Water resistant fabric, seams and zip

The Dhb Micro Saddle Bag has a 0.4 litre capacity, so there’s room for ride essentials in a compact package that sits close to the saddle, weighs 29g and won’t interrupt your bike’s aerodynamics.

It’s made with a water resistant fabric and zip and has welded seams, so there should be decent waterproofing. A reflective logo and easy-to-use zip add to its convenience, while hook and loop straps secure it to your saddle rails.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £3

Topeak Mini 9 Pro Multi Tool

£8.99 (RRP £22.99) | View offer

  • Range of tolls and two tyre levers
  • Compact, 73g and with a neoprene sleeve

A decent multitool is an essential to carry on every ride, helping you to sort out mechanical issues. The Topeak Mini 9 Pro has the essential range of Allen keys to tackle most loose bolts as well as a Torx bit and Phillips screwdriver.

Also built in is a folding metal tyre lever and a removable plastic one, so you’ve got punctures covered as well. The tool weighs just 73g and comes with its own neoprene sleeve, making it a perfect ride companion.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £8.99

Elite Custom Race Plus Bottle Cage

£8.59 (RRP £13.99) | View offer

  • Lightweight fibre reinforced bottle cage
  • Good bottle retention and durability

Weighing just 40g, the Custom Race Plus bottle cage is made of fibre reinforced plastic and a good alternative to expensive carbon cages that will save you some cash too. An update of Elite’s classic Custom Race cage, the bottle cage is designed to ensure firm retention of a bottle even over uneven surfaces.

The Custom Race Plus cage is durable, looks good and has pro team endorsement, with Elite’s sponsored WorldTour teams. The shape and colour are similar to the Elite Vico Carbon bottle cage and the Custom Race Plus is just 15g heavier. The black colour will retain its looks well with use too.

  • Buy now from Merlin for £8.50

Continental Quality Road Inner Tube

£2.99-£4.99 (RRP £7.49) | View offer

  • Quality inner butyl rubber tube
  • Wide range of sizes and valve options

Even if you’ve gone tubeless, it’s a fact of cycling life that sooner or later you’re going to need a spare inner tube. Conti’s standard tubes are good quality and not too heavy to carry around with you on a ride.

There’s a wide range of Presta valved tubes with 42mm length valve stems and covering tyre widths from 20mm to 47mm available on Wiggle, all with a discount. There are also reduced priced Schrader and Dunlop valve options. Prices for the most used options start at just £2.99, so it’s a good time to stock up.

  • Buy now from Wiggle for £2.99-£4.99

Shopping for someone else? Don’t miss our guide to the best gifts for cyclists

The post Best cycling deals 2023: Hand-picked deals for bike lovers appeared first on Cyclist.
author: jrobinson
